verbose_text: Moreover, the extended indications of PD in case of tumors associating hepatic artery (HA) variants or invading the mesentericoportal axis (borderline resectable pancreatic head adenocarcinomas) [XREF_BIBR], as well as the importance to achieve R 0 posteromedial resection margins (in adenocarcinomas and main duct-intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasms-MD-IPMN) [XREF_BIBR], led to the development of so called " artery first " approaches [XREF_BIBR].
